description: Why study this courseThis course aims to complement a relevant undergraduate degree by introducing students to hydro-informatics, computational hydraulics and environmental hydraulics, including water quality indicators and sediment transport processes in coastal, estuarine and inland
duration: 1 year full time, 3 years part time
fees: FeesFor programme fees please visit our website: Full time - Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course. Part time - Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
